docs.title: Audit Log Pro
docs.text:
Compliance-ready audit logging.

Structured, searchable, and tamper-evident audit logs for every economic event.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Structured Events — JSON format
  • Searchable — Query by type/date
  • Tamper-Evident — Hash verification

docs.title: Development Setup
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Audit-Log-Pro.git
cd Audit-Log-Pro
python -m venv .venv
.venv\Scripts\activate
pip install -e ".[dev]"

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
uv pip install git+https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Audit-Log-Pro.git

from audit_log import Logger

logger = Logger()
logger.log("CREDIT_CONSUMED", amount=10, user="user-1")
